rules.text: No bots unless approved by an admin
No threats or incitement to violence
No dissemination of demonstrably false claims for manipulative purposes
No racism, sexism, or discrimination based on sexual orientation, gender identity, religion or disability
No content that is illegal under EU laws
Sexually explicit or pornographic content must use the "content warning" feature

Almost all of which goes to landfill. That seems like a hilariously simple problem to optimise, and we need a real careful look at our incentive systems to understand why it's not automatic.

Almost all of which goes to landfill. That seems like a hilariously simple problem to optimise, and we need a real careful look at our incentive systems to understand why it's not automatic.
